0100100101001000 1000101011100110 1 -> sum: 1101010000101111, cout: 0
1001000000110100 0111111111000011 1 -> sum: 0000111111111000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
